description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. DeadKings is a creepy dungeon crawling adventure.  Players are reincarnated as medieval knights who must explore the haunted interior of an abandoned castle. Able to wield dozens of items and a single candle to light the way, gamers must battle untold creatures lurking in the darkness. Can you survive long enough to loot the entire castle and take the Sword of Valor for your own? We Doubt it !!
